amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Office of Congressional Ethics by $190,970 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in House Report 114-611 to reduce the Office of Congressional Ethics budget to FY16 levels and transfers remaining funds to the deficit reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pearce amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 137 - 270 (Roll no. 292).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Pearce amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 137 - 270 (Roll no. 292).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Pearce.
